<h1 style="text-align: center;">Hi there! Welcome to my website! <img src="https://media.giphy.com/media/hvRJCLFzcasrR4ia7z/giphy.gif" width="30px"/> </h1> 


I am Adam, a PhD candidate at the University of Antwerp working in the field of *environmental toxicology*. If you're curious about my academic journey and accomplishments, feel free to explore [my scientific output](https://adamcseresznye.github.io/blog/scientific_output.html) for more information.

This platform is dedicated to my pursuit of mastering *data science*, and I would invite you to join me. Here, you'll find various [projects](https://adamcseresznye.github.io/blog/projects.html), [blog posts](https://adamcseresznye.github.io/blog/articles.html), and valuable tidbits that may serve as a source of inspiration for your own journey. 

Let's embark on this data-driven journey together!
